媦字的基本解释

媦
wèi
妹妹：“同安公主，高祖同母媦也。”
传说中的兽名。

媦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wèi］
［《廣韻》于貴切，去未，云。］
(1)妹。
(2)传说中的怪物名。

媦字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　媦； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页267第27
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?于貴切，音胃。【說文】楚人謂女弟曰媦。【唐書·宗室傳】同安公主，高祖同母媦也。媦妹轉音，義同。

媦字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
媦字的起名意思

暂无。

Woman
Basic explanation of words
Woman
wèi
Sister: "Princess Tong'an, the same mother and grandfather."
The legendary animal name.
Woman
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wèi］
["Guangyun" Yu Guiqie, Quwei, Yun. ]
(1) Sister.
(2) The name of the legendary monster.
Woman
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　媦; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 267 27
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Yu Guiqie, sound stomach. [Said the text] Chu people said that the female brother called the woman. [Book of Tang·Clan Biography] Princess Tongan, the same mother and grandfather. The voice of the sister-in-law has the same meaning.
